column4: Question: How do i find compiz shortcuts? I believe Super+V and Super+C are being used by compiz, but i want it to be used by Amarok. The problem is i dont know _which_ compiz feature is using it
you may want to install ccsm, this will allow you to see what the plugins and shortcuts are

Can you suggest any compiz features that would cause these two? Super+V seems to make the window full size (not maximized.. just resized to full), and Super+C centers my mouse. Super+V is not controlled by the "Resize" feature in compiz.. or so it seems, i dont see anything bound to Super+V
i'm no expert,  anyone else have an idea?
